channel.title: Workshop Maps on Game Server?
channel.description:
Hello, the Console Variable "[i]host_workshop_map[/i]" dont exist in Black Mesa.
So how is it possible to Host a Workshop Map on a Game Server? Is it planned to bring this Console Variable back?

item.title: Workshop Maps on Game Server?
item.dc:creator: Hubicorn
item.description:
BirdUp:

Agreed, this is a big deal. Of course you can just use a redirect but that dosnt guarantee that everyone has the same version of the map. Workshop is really useful for authors that frequently update maps.

I think the community would benefit greatly from workshop server integration.

We totally agree with you! This is something we are looking into and have planned in our road map. I will let everyone know when we have more details to share.

Read full topic

But when you update a workshop map everyone gets automatic the bsp. Ath the moment Workshop for MP maps is useless.

Can you not just launch the server with the map? Or switch to it w/ the map change command?
